German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German kleidunge, from kleiden (“to clothe”), from kleit, from Old High German *kleid, from Proto-Germanic *klaiþą (“cloth”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈklaɪ̯dʊŋ/
  • Audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • Audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Kleidung f (genitive Kleidung, plural Kleidungen)

  1. (countable) clothing; apparel
  2. (uncountable, rather formal) clothes

Declension[edit]

Declension of Kleidung
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieKleidungdieKleidungen
genitiveeinerderKleidungderKleidungen
dativeeinerderKleidungdenKleidungen
accusativeeinedieKleidungdieKleidungen

Synonyms[edit]

  • (clothes): Anziehsachen (informal); Klamotten (informal, colloquial)

Related terms[edit]

  • Kleid
  • Bekleidung
